item.title: YoloV5 Deployment Optimization with Neural Magic
item.description: Table Of Contents 🔥 Motivation: 🔫 What: 🚒 Why: ⛳ How: 🔩 Setting Up Table Resume Prediction Speed Table Resume Metrics 🙏 Comments & Feedback Follow me 👇 🔥 Motivation: Link to heading As architecture get more complex, for improved prediction results, the generated model are larger and larger, therefore the need to reduce their size and allow the model to run prediction on CPU. This enables developer to reduce infostructres costs as well as opening the door for edge deployment.

item.title: Negative Samples Dilemma In Object Detection
item.description: Table Of Contents 🔥 Motivation 🔫 Why 🔩 What are negative samples? 🩺 The Other Side 🙏 Comments & Feedback Follow me 👇 🔥 Motivation Link to heading This is the dilemma that every machine learning practitioners have faced it while working on object detection problem. In this blog, I will share my thoughts, in order to help new engineers in making the correct choices when they are setting up the dataset pipeline.
